page.title: 16SHOPS IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: We have already mentioned that there are four main places where people live.Stockton on Forest,Hopgrove, Warthill and Holtby. The last two mentioned villages have about 200 and 100 people living in them but have no shops at all.The residents say that they do their shop- ping in York or get the free bus to the ASDA Supermarket about five miles away in Huntington. Stockton on Forest has two shops, (the Post Office and the V.G Grocery Store).The Post Office caters for the 900 people in Stockton for postal services,child benefits & pensions. It also sells some food,newspapers and stationery.The V.G.shop has a good little business as a mini-supermarket. At Hopgrove there is a little shop/Post Office but there are only about 95 people living there.
